page.title: Welcome
page.hero.title: Welcome to Street Football Club!
page.hero.description: Here is your best destination for finding players, creating teams, planning games and more! We believes in the passion, joy and sense of community that football brings.
page.hero.small: We love and grove football. For you. For the game.

page.categories.game.title: Games. Plan your games at a convenient place and time for you!
page.categories.game.description: Look for a game for the weekend. Or players of your level. Or just anyone to play with! Choose a place for your game for any seasons.
page.categories.players.title: Players. Find sparring partners or even friends!

page.categories.teams.title: Teams. Be the leader of your team or part of the success!
page.categories.teams.description: Find new rivals. Arrage cool competitions! Raise your own level of play and level of your team.
